WRITING.TEXT: If the ball crosses the boundary/fence without touching the ground in its path to it, you are awarded 6 runs for it. If u bowl underarm there would be hardly any bounce on the ball and hitting a ball that is rolling on the ground into the air for such long distance is impossible.

The fuck is going on?? Looks like we r a man down and Leverkusen r pressing us hard! We r only able to make backwards passes..and any forward pass is being intercepted. Now Dembele is out. Hopefully Jansen works some magic and Eriksen goes into CAM. Much more suited there than LAM. (30 mins in)

WRITING.TITLE: CYNIC - Kindly Bent to Free Us [Progressive Metal]

When youre a classical pianist but you listened to hip hop once
Mineral water claims to be Anti Ageing, Anti Obese.

WRITING.TEXT: This song is the gateway to Death Metal for a lot of ppl I know!
